text:
Although President Biden and Secretary Mayorkas still refuse to label the horrific situation at our border as a crisis, Secretary Mayorkas is now admitting to an 'immediate need' to build additional border wall in Texas. 

Any additional barrier must be followed up by the political will to enforce our immigration laws. 20 miles of border wall will not stop the outright invasion of our country—only consequences will.

I voted to retain Kevin McCarthy as Speaker of the House because of his proven record in securing monumental energy permitting reform and prioritizing border security. I stood with over 95% of Republican lawmakers—including every Texas House member. The motion to vacate is nothing but a distraction from the important work we were sent here to accomplish. 

It's time to stop fighting amongst ourselves as a Party and fight the Democrats who every day tear down the country we love and swore to protect.

Speaker McCarthy is a fighter for energy dominance—demonstrated through his multiple trips to the Permian Basin and by securing the most significant permitting reform in 40 years to revolutionize our industry. I am proud to work under his leadership.

Under @SpeakerMcCarthy's leadership, House Republicans cut $2 trillion in wasteful spending, secured the first major energy permitting reform in 40 years, and are continuing to expose corruption in the Biden Administration. 

Next up —> We will secure the southern border.

Liberal sanctuary cities like New York that openly obstruct federal immigration laws and have policies in place to shield criminals from these laws should not be immune from the crisis at our border. My amendment to block Remain-in-Texas PASSED the House.
All Border Patrol agents relegated to processing. The southern border is an extreme national security risk.

.@HouseGOP passed the best, most comprehensive border security bill in decades. 

That bill needs to go to the Senate and the President needs to make a decision. 

If he wants to keep the government open, he needs to shut down the border.
If the President wants to keep the government open, he needs to shut down the border.
NO.

Want to talk about shutdowns? The President must SHUT DOWN the border.

I watched hundreds of able bodied men stream across our border illegally in Eagle Pass, TX en masse yesterday. 

Unacceptable.

Foreign flag planted on U.S. soil today in Eagle Pass. The person who put up this flag did so proudly and intentionally after crossing our border illegally, and was then allowed into our country.

So wrong.
I watched hundreds of migrants march across our border illegally en masse this morning. This is nothing less than an invasion.
Wishing all who celebrate a reflective and peaceful Yom Kippur.
Update from the border crisis in Eagle Pass, TX:
Update on the ongoing government funding negotiations.
"Sanctuary State"
Horrible.
Texas should not be bearing the brunt of the Biden Border Crisis. Secure the border.

205 Democrats voted to allow the Pentagon to use taxpayer dollars on abortion expenses. 

Our military must be focused on readiness—not ending the lives of the unborn.

DHS Secretary Mayorkas just appointed former CIA Director James Clapper and former DNI Director John Brennan—who both deserve to be stripped of their security clearances for years of lying to the American people about the so-called 'Russia hoax'—to a "Homeland Intelligence Experts Group."

We cannot allow these partisan hacks to influence our nation's security apparatus. dailycaller.com/2023/09/19/b…

The Biden Administration's crisis at our border has only gotten worse since I took this photo of 15k Haitians sweltering in the heat in Del Rio 2 years ago.

Texans deserve better. All Americans deserve better.

It's been two years since I was under the bridge in Del Rio, Texas with 15,000 illegal migrants gathered in the sweltering heat. 

Unfortunately, the #BidenBorderCrisis has only gotten worse. 

Securing the border and ending this madness remains my top priority.

Happy 76th Birthday to the @usairforce! I am extremely grateful for the nearly 20 years I spent on active duty in the Air Force serving alongside heroic men and women willing to put their lives on the line to protect our great nation. 

Aim High... Fly-Fight-Win!
"The border is secure." — DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas
Unacceptable.
FACT CHECK: FALSE. The Admin just canceled all remaining oil and gas leases in Alaska’s North Slope last week.

Electric vehicles aren’t for everyone... just ask Secretary Granholm how her recent road trip in an EV went. Spoiler alert: the cops were called.

I'm proud to support @RepJohnJoyce's legislation to stop the EPA from imposing a ban on gas-powered cars.

NEWS: I'm introducing legislation today with @RepMTG @RepRonnyJackson to ban DHS from establishing another Disinformation Governance Board. 

DHS should be securing the border — not censoring Americans on social media. washingtonexaminer.com/news/…
I'm heartbroken to learn about the tragic passing of @Rep_Peltola's husband, Eugene. Lifting you and your family up in prayer.

Biden’s Assistant Secretary for the Office of Electricity doesn’t know how much electricity the U.S. uses, or even how much he pays for electricity each month. I assured him that every person in #TX11 knows that their electricity bills have doubled under this administration.

President Biden's Remain-in-Texas policy must remain in the trash can. My legislation will block any efforts by this administration to force Texans to bear the brunt of their immigration crisis. foxnews.com/politics/bidens-… #FoxNews

I support an Impeachment Inquiry of President Joe Biden. In addition to creating the worst border crisis in history, the allegations and proven record against the President involving a serious influence-peddling scheme are outrageous and have rightly concerned millions of Americans. 

This Congress has exposed serious wrongdoing - it is now time to formalize our investigation to fight Democrat stonewalling and a partisan Department of Justice. I take no pleasure in this announcement. 

This is not a partisan exercise but a solemn constitutional duty.

On the anniversary of 9/11, President Biden announced a $6 billion hostage deal with Iran—the largest state sponsor of terror. 

This is beyond tone deaf and only endangers Americans and our allies around the world.

Today I am remembering my pilot training classmate, Tammy Archuleta, who was deployed to Afghanistan flying helicopters following 9/11 and tragically killed during a rescue mission.

We will never forget.

Biden's Energy Secretary wants to force every American to drive an electric vehicle, yet she couldn't even complete a 10-hour road trip without major issues. 

10 hours won't even get Texans across the state.
npr.org/2023/09/10/118722486…
The Tambunga family is enduring an unthinkable tragedy. I am proud of Elisa for speaking out about the true consequences of the border crisis.

8:46am ET — 22 years ago. We will never forget. 

In the memory of those we lost on that tragic day, and in honor of the heroes who emerged from the ashes, let us rededicate ourselves to the principles that bind us as a nation.

The Biden Administration is considering a ‘Remain-in-Texas’ policy for illegal immigrants after liberal Sanctuary Cities like New York complained about housing migrants. 

I will fight this tooth and nail.
Natural gas carrying the grid as ERCOT declares its first power emergency since Winter Storm Uri … when it comes to energy, I’m for the BEST of the above.

The U.S. stands with India in its commitment to democracy and freedom as their nation hosts the G20 Summit for the first time in history.

I look forward to a continued strong partnership between our two countries.

🚨BREAKING: A federal judge just issued an injunction against the State of Texas ordering the removal of 1,000 feet of river buoy barriers in the Rio Grande in Eagle Pass, TX by September 15th. 

It’s ridiculous that instead of enforcing the laws at our border, the Biden Admin is focusing their efforts on suing Texas for taking steps to deter illegal migrant crossings.

Proud to see the Broadband Buildout Accountability Act that I introduced with @SenRickScott featured by the Taxpayers Protection Alliance. 

Our legislation ensures that $42 Billion in taxpayer dollars will be protected from misuse.

If the Biden Admin is willing to cripple the oil and gas industry, threaten our nation’s national security and obliterate tens of thousands of jobs in my district in a so-called effort to save a lizard, they need to face the communities they want to destroy.

dailycaller.com/2023/08/31/p…
Praying for you, Leader!

Camille and I are deeply saddened to learn of the passing of Sydney Marie Martenis, daughter of my friend and colleague Congressman Derrick Van Orden. Derrick always had the brightest smile when he talked about  Sydney and I know her memory will bring joy to many. May she rest in peace.

It has been over a week since wildfires have ravaged and destroyed parts of Hawaii… President Biden compared a small kitchen fire in his home to the massive destruction in Lahaina. This administration is out of touch with its citizens and the issues plaguing our country.
Absolutely horrible. We must secure our border.
Bidenomics
Thank you for your support in protecting the unborn and the safety of the mothers!

The Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals found that the FDA likely violated the law when it deregulated the dangerous chemical abortion drug Mifepristone.

This is a win for protecting the lives of the unborn and the safety of mothers. I am proud to have led the House of Representatives on an Amicus Brief to the Court on this important issue. 

usatoday.com/story/news/poli…

Great to be in Lampasas at the Edwards Ranch today with the @TexasFarmBureau talking about the drought, the upcoming Farm Bill, and the struggles facing producers. Farmers and ranchers are here in the good times and the bad—and I will always support them!
Thank you to Border Patrol and @TxDPS!
Chairman Comer’s work must continue. We would know nothing if not for this Republican majority.
Border security is national security.

Today marks a solemn day as we honor the memory of the innocent lives lost in the U.S. Embassy Bombings in Tanzania and Kenya 25 years ago.

We stand together, united in grief and remembrance, never forgetting the bravery and resilience shown by those affected.

Let us take a moment to reflect on the families and friends who lost their loved ones in this senseless act of violence. Their legacy lives on in the strength and unity of our nation and the resilience of the affected nations. 

May this anniversary serve as a reminder of the importance of strength in protecting American citizens at home and around the world.

I strongly condemn the disgraceful attacks on law enforcement and dangerous destruction of private property by thousands of youths in New York City. Police officers deserve our full support despite the environment of lawlessness encouraged by the Mayor and radical City Council.

It is appalling to witness how quickly this group of young people was willing to escalate to violence, specifically towards the police. All responsible parties must be prosecuted to the full extent of the law.
Thank you for sharing your expertise with West Texas!

Thank you to @JohnCornyn and @SenJoniErnst for making history and lending their time to speak as the Keynote Speakers at the West Texas Legislative Summit in San Angelo, TX.

We are lucky to have their leadership in the Senate.

They made San Angelo their home and they have made this community better in every way. 

Now, every veteran who walks in for care at the Colonel Charles and JoAnne Powell VA Clinic—and every person in the community who drives by—will be a part of the legacy of Charles and JoAnne.

They are true American heroes who dedicated their lives to serving our country through a distinguished career in the U.S. Air Force, and later in civilian life when they became two of the most ardent advocates for veterans and military members.

In 1995, I was seeking a nomination to the Air Force Academy. Charles and JoAnne Powell interviewed and guided me through the application process. 

Nearly 30 years later, @JohnCornyn and I had the honor of renaming the San Angelo, TX VA Clinic in their honor.

Opening up another fantastic West Texas Legislative Summit with a bipartisan panel on Energy! 

Thank you to these leaders for joining me in San Angelo.

Whether with sagebrush lizards, lesser prairie chickens, or outright bans on new oil and gas leases, the Biden Administration is leveraging a whole-of-government approach to assault Texas energy and agriculture.

TODAY ➡️@HouseGOP will strike down the Biden EPA's latest scheme.
How is this equality?

Thank you to the @NYPDnews Harbor Unit for showing me and @RepDesposito + @RepMikeLawler with @HomelandGOP their impressive capabilities in counterterrorism, search & rescue, and more. 

We are grateful for your service in protecting Americans!
Both chambers of Congress affirm support for Israel!

In addition to fighting crime on the streets, @NYPDnews does incredible work combatting terrorism in New York and across the country.

It's a privilege to be joined by former NYPD detective @RepDesposito. Thank you to all our law enforcement heroes!

I hope all 535 Members of the House and Senate vote against antisemitism and affirm that Israel is not a racist state.

Israel is not a racist state.

I hope my Resolution supporting Israel receives a YES vote from all 435 Members🇺🇸🇮🇱

SOON ➡️ The House is voting on my resolution in support of Israel that lets every American know exactly where their Representatives stand when it comes to supporting Israel and our Jewish communities.

I hope all 435 Members of Congress join me.

Israel is our strongest partner in the Middle East, and recent Member comments denigrating Israel are unacceptable and disgusting. 

My resolution lets every American know exactly where their Representatives stand when it comes to supporting Israel and our Jewish communities.

This is one of the world’s most dangerous migrant routes fraught with sexual assaults, robberies, killings, and extreme natural conditions. 

A terrible situation. We will continue working for a solution to secure our border and stop these migrants from risking their lives to make the dangerous trek.

On June 6th, 1944, more than 160,000 Allied troops stormed the beaches of Normandy, France, resulting in the most significant invasion in history. This coast-wide invasion marked the turn of World War II and the Allies' conquest to defeat Adolf Hitler and the Nazi regime.

One of the heroes of the battle is James “Earl” Rudder of Eden, Texas. He led a platoon of men during the D-Day invasion to secure cliffs known as Pointe du Hoc and hide enemy cannons. 

Please join me in honoring brave soldiers, like our #TX11 hero Major General James Earl Rudder, who fought in the name of freedom for our nation!

The U.S. is a global leader in sustainable food production. With worldwide demand for food on the rise, it is absolute insanity to jeopardize food security in the name of climate change. cowboystatedaily.com/2023/06…
The last thing farmers and ranchers need is John Kerry's "green wisdom." Stay away from rural America. foxnews.com/politics/john-ke…

I'm proud to have stood up against WOTUS and am pleased that rural America will no longer suffer from this regulatory uncertainty.

Congratulations to Texas Tech graduate General Charles Q. Brown Jr., who has been nominated by President Biden as the next Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff. General Brown will be the first Airman in this post in 18 years. Now it is time to refocus our military on lethality and readiness to ensure we are prepared against any threats facing our Nation.

The HALT Fentanyl Act will help end the fentanyl crisis by cracking down on criminals who are trafficking deadly drugs into our communities.

I'm holding @EPAMichaelRegan accountable.

House Republicans passed a plan to fix the national debt crisis, save nearly $5 trillion in the next ten years, put an end to government programs being weaponized against our own citizens, and get people back to work—all while protecting Medicare and Social Security.

President Biden must make the right choice for Americans and come to the table to negotiate.

It's time for President Biden to come to the table and negotiate.

American deserve a safe, free, and prosperous country.
Despite the President's likely claims tonight about the State of our Union, Americans know their lives are not better, safer, OR stronger under this President.

While President Biden may hype up the recent 3.5% unemployment number, he’ll fail to mention how many people are getting second and third jobs just to afford food and gas. 

When President Biden took office, inflation was at just 1.4%... but it spiked to 13% under his watch.

Nearly 1/3 of households struggle to pay their energy bills, and 1 in 5 forgo necessities to pay an energy bill.

41% of Americans say they are worse off now than before President Biden took office according to an ABC/WaPo poll... the worst result since the first poll in 1986.

More than 100 terrorists have been caught trying to cross the southern border since President Biden took office. And we have no idea how many are among the million+ "gotaways." 

December set a new record high for migration, with monthly encounters exceeding 250,000.
The REAL State of the Union🧵:

38 years ago today, President Ronald Reagan delivered the State of the Union Address on his birthday and declared: "Anything is possible in America if we have the faith, the will, and the heart."

Happy Birthday, President Reagan! 🇺🇸

The President will likely declare that the State of the Union is "strong" tomorrow.

The American people do not feel like their lives are better, safer, OR stronger under this President.

This is not just about a balloon…it’s about China probing the US to see what our reaction was. And the Biden Administration failed. Deterrence only works when technical capability is paired with Political Will. We need a President who has the will to protect us!

President Biden needs to reassert American strength. He must unequivocally stand up and make it clear that violating our sovereign territory is not okay, and that we will defend our country at all costs.

Job well done by the pilot. But our country is at a crossroads when it comes to our national security. Our land border, our cyber border, now our airspace is being infringed upon by bad actors testing us.

I’m an F-22 pilot, I’ve flown countless defensive counter air missions, with the goal of protecting the homeland. These missions happen all the time with lives and our national security on the line. This is what we do and the duty we swore to this country.

The Chinese spy balloon was not a surprise to the Biden Admin. They should have dealt with this the instant it crossed into our sovereign territory BEFORE it traveled across the entire United States.

Unfortunately, the message sent abroad is that Biden will not protect America.

The Biden Administration's failure to protect the U.S. mainland from Chinese spy balloons is an example of how his foreign policy weaknesses threaten our national security. Put an end to Chinese spying on Americans–whether in our airspace or through our phones.
